page.title: 03A LOCAL INDUSTRY IN WOOTTON
page.content: The{Olney Canvas and PVC works}is situated in a two storey converted garage along{Red Road in Wootton. About 85% of the goods that made are for physiotherapy and nursing aids. The rest are used for such uses as uphholstery in boats. The goods go to hospitals or to distributors but the factory does not deal directly with overseas countries. The Olneys have owned the factory for 5 years and have 4 full time and a few part-time workers. They start work at 9 a.m. The workers are local people, as are the owners. Apart from the male owner and the son of the owners all the workers are female. The factory produces goods on a small scale and does not employ mass production.
